useroptions.name: GM Only
useroptions.description: If checked, Weather will ignore non-GM requests. Unchecked by default.

useroptions.name: Automatic Time Advancement
useroptions.description: If checked, Weather will automatically detect changes in time and update the weather accordingly. Checked by default.

useroptions.name: Rate of Passing Time
useroptions.description: This number determines how much faster the script will treat the passage of time. Does nothing if 'Automatic Time Advancement' is deactivated. Defaults to 7 (one in-game week per real day). Minimum of 1 (time passes at the same rate).

useroptions.name: In-game Days Per Season
useroptions.description: This number determines how long each season will last in-game. Defaults to 92 (roughly 3 months a season). Minimum of 0 (no seasons).

useroptions.name: Trend Scale Percentage
useroptions.description: This number represents the percentage of potential change used. For example, a value of 1000 would increase the daily temperature trends by 10 times the original. Increase this value for larger fluxuations, decrease it for more stability. Defaults to 100 (100% of original values). Minimum of 0 (no fluctuations).
